attributes.action: American Government not UK tax payer should pay security cost Trump State Visit
attributes.additional_details:
The State Visit is not justified at this stage of the Trump Presidency 

It will cause embarrassment to Queen & cause huge public protests at massive cost to tax payer 

Presidents Reagan, George H W Bush & Clinton never had state visit to UK throughout their terms of office 

Presidents George W Bush & Obama only had state visit after 3 years into their Presidency 

If the State Visit goes ahead against will British people the US Government should pay all security costs not British tax payers
attributes.background: Despite over 2 million signing e petition and Speaker Bercow calling for Trump to be banned from speaking in Parliament, Prime Minister is refusing call off State Visit. In view this decision, hundreds thousands are expected join protests in London which push policing costs well over £15 million

rejection.details: This petition calls on the American Government, not the UK Government, to take action. You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to ask the Government of the USA to pay certain costs relating to the state visit.
